resources.string:
Firmly believing in a fair-go-for-all and cutting out the middleman plus a passion for breaking industry monopolies, our founders came up with this idea.
we are building the most reliable and convenient way to make car ownership hassle-free. We are a bunch of enthusiastic animal lovers who share a passion for crafting great products. Car.e is built around the belief that when people are treated better, they provide better service.
